test_case.signature: void parse(final DITContentRule contentRule, final String definition)
test_case.full_signature: @Test(groups = "schema", dataProvider = "definitions") public void parse(final DITContentRule contentRule, final String definition)

fields.original_string:
private static final Pattern DEFINITION_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(
    WSP_REGEX + "\\(" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:NAME (?:'([^']+)'|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:DESC '([^']*)')?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(OBSOLETE)?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:AUX (?:(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:MUST (?:(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:MAY (?:(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:NOT (?:(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:(X-[^ ]+.*))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "\\)" + WSP_REGEX);

DEFINITION_PATTERN = Pattern.compile(
    WSP_REGEX + "\\(" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(" + NO_WSP_REGEX + ")" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:NAME (?:'([^']+)'|\\(([^\\)]+)\\)))?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(?:DESC '([^']*)')?" +
      WSP_REGEX + "(OBSOLETE)?" +
